name: Hikikomori No Chuunibyou
description: Hikikomori No Chuunibyou is a pseudo 8-bit platform-adventure game with beat-em-up, puzzle, and stealth elements. With its storytelling directing the player through open-ended levels, progression through each stage requires usage of parkour-like abilities and martial-arts techniques.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 16 MB available space
